content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate. After reading the scenario, respond to A, B, and C below. Referencing the scenario, describe the structural barrier to voting that is discussed above. Explain why the structural barrier described in part A may be more of an obstacle in some states than in others. If youth voter turnout increases as a result of the actions in the scenario, explain how this could affect the way candidates run campaigns in the future.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate. After reading the scenario, respond to A, B, and C below. skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
